post:
![Big Sales!](https://indovirtue.com/let/sale.jpg)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Now our dedi and VPS limited sales is open again until April 15th! Welcome to IndoVirtue, where server hosting has never been this fast, easy and affordable. 10% of our profit goes for charity!**

Who Are We?
-----------

We have been providing managed cPanel website hosting solutions since late 2010 at local city in Bali (Indonesia) for startup projects, companies and young entrepreneurs. Then we continued entering unmanaged dedicated servers and VPS market since around May 2013 globally under international commercial domain, before finally were featured on LowEndBox at the end of 2014.

With **more than 8 years of experience**, we are currently holding strong with many happy customers from all around the world, hosted at our Singapore and USA location. We are happily inviting you to host your applications at IndoVirtue, where uptime is our passion and customer satisfaction is our goals. Get ready to tap your business and services with us!

This thread is not meant for support. Instead, please feel free to [Contact Us.](https://indovirtue.com/contact-us) We will be happy and grateful to answer any questions, suggestions and feedbacks you may have!
    
.		
Product Lineup  
==========  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ Dedicated Server Packages - Singapore (click for full portfolio)](https://indovirtue.com/dedicated-server)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
**SGBUDGET-1**   
E3-1265Lv3 / E3-1275Lv3 / E3-1270Lv4 (random)   
8 GB RAM (16/32 GB available)   
2 TB HDD / 120 GB SSD (4 bays maximum)   
1 IPv4 Address (more IPv4/IPv6 available)   
 **Unlimited 100 Mbit Port** on Singapore HE Network (1Gbit Port and BGP also available).   
 **$55/month but with LEB/LET exclusive coupon, it becomes $49.5/month recurring.** [Order Now!](https://billing.indovirtue.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)   
**Coupon: LEBSGBUDGET1A (10% discount, SGBUDGET-1 only)**     
   
* $3 / Additional IPv4, 16 GB RAM is +$15, 240GB SSD is +$10, 480GB SSD is +$20 and 4TB HDD is +$20. Check order page for even more options!    
* IP test / Looking glass in [here,](http://singaporepop-lg.indovirtue.com/) no direct China/Philippines.   
* [Click for our latency test from multiple locations.](https://pulse.turbobytes.com/results/5b783d88ecbe406ef8001d7b/)    
* 24-48 Hours setup time (VPS is instant), no setup fees, prorated billing to date 1 every month. **More discount on longer terms!**    
* OS: Any Linux and Windows OS request possible, just fill the details in instruction form. There is a possibility of additional charge for licensed OS.    
* For further hardware / Harddisk / SSD / RAM / IP customization and stock inquiry, feel free to contact us via our [support ticket system.](https://billing.indovirtue.com/contact.php)    
    
.		
	
------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[ VPS Packages - USA (click for full portfolio)](https://indovirtue.com/us-ssd-vps)   
---------------------------------------------------------

1024 MB RAM   
20 GB SSD Storage   
1 vCPU   
1 IPv4   
1000 GB Bandwidth   
$5 / month **but with LEB/LET exclusive coupon, it becomes $7.7/quarter or $29.15/year recurring.** [Order Now!](https://billing.indovirtue.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=52)
**Coupon: USKVMSSDLEB-A (45% discount, USKVMSSD with 3, 6, 12 month payment only)**

* [Our network looking glass](http://us-lg.indovirtue.com/) (for ping, traceroute and test ip / files).

* [Click for our latency test from multiple locations.](https://pulse.turbobytes.com/results/5c99062cecbe4001a807d982/)   
* 1 Gbit port burstable, network null on DDoS by default.**
* [Click for our sequential write test and download test (in MByte).](https://indovirtue.com/ustest.png)

[ VPS Packages - Premium Singapore (click for full portfolio)](https://indovirtue.com/premium-singapore-ssd-vps)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**What makes Premium Singapore different with Budget Singapore above?**

* Better node specification: faster CPU, I/O, bandwidth speed:
![Information!](https://indovirtue.com/wp-content/uploads/premium-test.png)
* Direct connectivity to China, around 50ms ~ 90ms. Click for [China Latency Test.](http://ping.chinaz.com/116.251.223.250)
* It also has better ping to Thailand, Philippines, Taiwan and Europe continent (compare latency test on each product details.)      

**If you're not satisfied with our Budget VPS network performance above, please try our Premium Singapore VPS instead.**  


**SGOVZSSD-1** (OpenVZ Virtualization. KVM also available!)   
1024 MB RAM, 32MB vSwap   
20 GB SSD Storage   
1 Skylake vCPU Core   
1 IPv4, /64 IPv6   
400 GB Bandwidth   
$7/month. [Order Now!](https://billing.indovirtue.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17)   


* [Our network looking glass](http://singapore-lg.indovirtue.com/) (for ping, traceroute and test ip / files).   
* Network null on DDoS by default. For anti-DDoS options, please create a support ticket.   
* HostSG Network, Singapore. Multi-homed BGP network from multiple Tier-1 upstreams. [Complete AS Info and Peering List.](http://bgp.he.net/AS24482#_peers)   
* [Click for our latency test from multiple locations.](https://pulse.turbobytes.com/results/5b783f50ecbe406ef8001d8b/)   
* 1 Gbit port burstable, with excellent ping and throughput to every Asia country, including direct China routes.

Additional Bandwidth: $25/month for every 1000GB.   
    
.	
	
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 VPS Details
------------
* Additional IPv4: $3/month for every IP.   
* No setup fee with pro-rated billing to day one of each month, no minimum contract, 1 IPv4 and /64 IPv6 (Singapore only) for each VPS plan.   
* Accepting payments from almost all countries in the world by **PayPal, Indonesian Bank Transfer and Cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, and other 100+ supported coins).**   
* IPv4 and IPv6 reverse DNS can be set instantly by client at VPS control panel. On OpenVZ, TUN/TAP/GRE/PPTP/DAHDI/FUSE/IPTABLES can be enabled (KVM has it all).   
* VPS info usually emailed 45 seconds after payment received, unless our blacklist or anti-fraud system prevents it. Please make support ticket if there is a delay.   
* Cpanel VPS license is available and we also provide managed service. Requesting any custom OS templates and custom VPS specification is possible by making a support ticket.   
* Hosted on Enterprise Grade hardware to serve any of your critical applications: SuperMicro blade, Intel Xeon E3/E5, ECC RAM, pure SSD without spinning HDD.   

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Summary of Legal aspects
------------------------

* By signing up to our service, you are agree with our terms. Please read in details before at [https://indovirtue.com/legal](https://indovirtue.com/legal) and any unclear/unanswered question or exceptions of rules can be asked via support tickets.
* 7 days refund period only for VPS (not valid if you break our TOS or paying using cryptocurrency) for new client.
* **TOR, Adult/pornographic, Virus/worm/trojan, and copyrighted content is prohibited. We will forward to you all complaints and you will be allowed twenty four hours to respond or delete the problematic files. No communication / replies means service suspension until further response by you.**
* **Legal by law activities only. No mail spamming, phishing, port scanning, OSCAM, hacking attempt and any other illegal activities.**

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Testimonial: http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showpost.php?p=8917695&postcount=2

Thank you for spending your time in reading this thread in details, we really appreciate it and definitely looking forward to serving you soon. Have a good day :)
